resps: Lead weekly workshops on emerging frontend technologies and conduct biweekly comprehensive code reviews, resulting in improvement in student project quality.
Manage student progress using project management tools, facilitating regular 1:1 meetings via Calendly to ensure accountability, leading to a 40%  increase in course completion rates.
Collaborate with career services to evaluate student readiness for job market entry, contributing to a 30% increase in job placement rates.
Implement and maintain a structured check-in system to monitor overall student development, proactively addressing challenges and reducing dropout rates by 20%.

Develop responsive and interactive user interfaces for complex banking applications using React and TypeScript, resulting in a 20% increase in user engagement and a 15% reduction in customer support tickets related to UI issues.
Utilized Mock Service Worker for robust frontend testing, improving application reliability and reducing development cycle time by 15%.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to implement new features and improve existing functionality, contributing to a 10% increase in overall product satisfaction scores.

Contributed to the development of reusable component libraries, leveraging Material-UI and custom design components, which accelerated project timelines by 20% and improved code consistency across the team.

Designed and integrated charts to efficiently represent statistical data, resulting in an improvement in user comprehension of complex financial information and a 25% increase in time spent on data analysis pages.

Implemented OAuth integration for Calendly using its API, ensuring seamless token management by utilizing refresh tokens for extended sessions beyond the initial 2-hour OAuth validity, reducing user authentication issues by 40%.

Advanced the user experience through dynamic route changes based on actions like date sorting and event history navigation, fortified by user-centric URL structuring, leading to a 35% decrease in navigation time and a 20% increase in user retention.
